sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Colum1, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, Colum2, ImgWrap, Img } from './InfoSectionElements'; import {Button} from '../ButtonElement'; const InfoSection = ({ lightbg, id, imgStart, topLine, headline, lightText, darkText, description, buttonLabel, img, alt, primary }) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headline} {description} ) } export default InfoSection;
